title: Alpine skiing at the 1976 Winter Olympics – Women's giant slalom
text:
The Women's <a href="giant%20slalom">giant slalom</a> competition of the <a href="Alpine%20skiing%20at%20the%201976%20Winter%20Olympics">Innsbruck 1976 Olympics</a> was held at <a href="Axamer%20Lizum">Axamer Lizum</a> on <a href="Friday%20the%2013th">Friday, 13 February</a>.
The defending <a href="FIS%20Alpine%20World%20Ski%20Championships%201974">world champion</a> was <a href="Fabienne%20Serrat">Fabienne Serrat</a> of France, while Austria's <a href="Annemarie%20Moser-Pr%C3%B6ll">Annemarie Moser-Pröll</a> was the defending <a href="1974%E2%80%9375%20FIS%20Alpine%20Ski%20World%20Cup">World Cup</a> giant slalom champion and Switzerland's <a href="Lise-Marie%20Morerod">Lise-Marie Morerod</a> led the <a href="1975%E2%80%9376%20FIS%20Alpine%20Ski%20World%20Cup">1976 World Cup</a>.
